### Load tidyverse and suppress its message

```{r message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```

### Assign values to objects "a" and "b"

```{r}
a <- 4/9
b <- 4/11
```

### Determine if a is less than b

```{r}
a > b
```

### List objects in environment

```{r}
ls()
```

### Remove objects from environment

```{r}
rm(list = ls())
```

### List objects in environment

```{r}
ls()
```

### Display loaded pacakges

```{r}
search()
```
